ViewObject.Name: PopulateLinesDataVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'Sample Status (Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO, 'RMG'||'/'||LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'/'||AWBEO.AWP_ID DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'-'||FABRIC_TYPE||'-'||COMPOSITION||'-'||PIECE_NAME ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(AWBEO.QTY) QUANTITY, 'Piece' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, Null Ship_to_location FROM PWC_ONT_SAM_STAT_AWP_DETAIL AWBEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = AWBEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND 'Sample Status (Dispatch)' = :pSource AND HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE = :pSourceDocNo AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT 'Sample Status (Sending)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO, 'RMG'||'/'||LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'/'||ITEM_TYPE||'/'||ToPriDepEO.TO_PRI_DEP DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'-'||FABRIC_TYPE||'-'||ITEM_TYPE||'-'||TO_PRINT_SIZE ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(ToPriDepEO.Send_To_Printing_Qty) QUANTITY, 'Piece' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, Null Ship_to_location FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_DET_TO_PRI_DEP ToPriDepEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = ToPriDepEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND 'Sample Status (Sending)' = :pSource AND HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE = :pSourceDocNo AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO, 'PRNT'||'/'||LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'/'||FromPriDepEO.ITEM_TYPE||'/'||FromPriDepEO.FROM_PRI_DEP DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'-'||FABRIC_TYPE||'-'||FromPriDepEO.ITEM_TYPE||'-'||TO_PRINT_SIZE ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(FromPriDepEO.Receive_Qty) QUANTITY, 'Piece' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, Null Ship_to_location FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_DET_TO_PRI_DEP ToPriDepEO, PWC_ONT_REQ_DET_FROM_PRI_DEP FromPriDepEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = ToPriDepEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND FromPriDepEO.TO_PRI_DEP = ToPriDepEO.TO_PRI_DEP AND 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' = :pSource AND HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE = :pSourceDocNo --AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId AND FromPriDepEO.PRODUCTION_UNIT_ID = :pOrgId /* UNION ALL SELECT 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO, 'PRNT'||'/'||LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'/'||FromPriDepEO.ITEM_TYPE||'/'||FromPriDepEO.FROM_PRI_DEP DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'-'||FABRIC_TYPE||'-'||FromPriDepEO.ITEM_TYPE||'-'||TO_PRINT_SIZE ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(FromPriDepEO.Qty_Send_To_Merch) QUANTITY, 'Piece' UOM FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_DET_TO_PRI_DEP ToPriDepEO, PWC_ONT_REQ_DET_FROM_PRI_DEP FromPriDepEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = ToPriDepEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND FromPriDepEO.TO_PRI_DEP = ToPriDepEO.TO_PRI_DEP AND FromPriDepEO.Qty_Send_To_Merch IS NOT NULL AND 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' = :pSource AND HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE = :pSourceDocNo --AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId AND FromPriDepEO.PRODUCTION_UNIT_ID = :pOrgId */ UNION ALL SELECT 'Sample Status (Sending)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO, 'RMG'||'/'||LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'/'||PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO.ITEM_TYPE||'/'||PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO.TO_EMB_ID DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'-'||FABRIC_TYPE||'-'||PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO.ITEM_TYPE||'-'||PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO.SIZES ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO.Printing_Qty) QUANTITY, 'Piece' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, Null Ship_to_location FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_TO_EMB_DEPT PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND 'Sample Status (Sending)' = :pSource AND HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE = :pSourceDocNo AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO, 'EMB'||'/'||LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'/'||PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO.ITEM_TYPE||'/'||PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.FROM_EMB_ID DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'-'||FABRIC_TYPE||'-'||PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO.ITEM_TYPE||'-'||PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO.SIZES ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.RECEIVED_QTY) QUANTITY, 'Piece' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, Null Ship_to_location FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_TO_EMB_DEPT PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO, PWC_ONT_REQ_FROM_EMB_DEPT PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.TO_EMB_ID = PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO.TO_EMB_ID AND 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' = :pSource AND HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE = :pSourceDocNo --AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId AND PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.PRODUCTION_UNIT_ID = :pOrgId /* UNION ALL SELECT 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO, 'EMB'||'/'||LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'/'||PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO.ITEM_TYPE||'/'||PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.FROM_EMB_ID DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'-'||FABRIC_TYPE||'-'||PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO.ITEM_TYPE||'-'||PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO.SIZES ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.PRODUCTION_QTY) QUANTITY, 'Piece' UOM FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_TO_EMB_DEPT PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO, PWC_ONT_REQ_FROM_EMB_DEPT PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.TO_EMB_ID = PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO.TO_EMB_ID AND PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.PRODUCTION_QTY IS NOT NULL AND 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' = :pSource AND HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE = :pSourceDocNo --AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId AND PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.PRODUCTION_UNIT_ID = :pOrgId */ UNION ALL SELECT 'Sample Status (Sending)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO, 'RMG'||'/'||LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'/'||ReqToWashingDetailsEO.ITEM_TYPE||'/'||ReqToWashingDetailsEO.REQ_DETAIL_ID DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'-'||FABRIC_TYPE||'-'||ReqToWashingDetailsEO.ITEM_TYPE||'-'||ReqToWashingDetailsEO.SIZE_VAL ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(ReqToWashingDetailsEO.Sent_Qty) QUANTITY, 'Piece' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, Null Ship_to_location FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_TO_WASH_DEP ReqToWashingDetailsEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = ReqToWashingDetailsEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND 'Sample Status (Sending)' = :pSource AND HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE = :pSourceDocNo AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO, 'WSH'||'/'||LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'/'||ReqToWashingDetailsEO.ITEM_TYPE||'/'||ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.WASH_RETURN_ID DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'-'||FABRIC_TYPE||'-'||ReqToWashingDetailsEO.ITEM_TYPE||'-'||ReqToWashingDetailsEO.SIZE_VAL ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.Received_Qty) QUANTITY, 'Piece' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, Null Ship_to_location FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_TO_WASH_DEP ReqToWashingDetailsEO, PWC_ONT_REQ_FROM_WASH_DEP ReqFromWashingDetailsEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = ReqToWashingDetailsEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.REQ_DETAIL_ID = ReqToWashingDetailsEO.REQ_DETAIL_ID AND 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' = :pSource AND HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE = :pSourceDocNo --AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId AND ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.PRODUCTION_UNIT_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT 'Sample Status (Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO, 'WSH'||'/'||LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'/'||ReqToWashingDetailsEO.ITEM_TYPE||'/'||ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.WASH_RETURN_ID DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'-'||FABRIC_TYPE||'-'||ReqToWashingDetailsEO.ITEM_TYPE||'-'||ReqToWashingDetailsEO.SIZE_VAL ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.Production_Qty) QUANTITY, 'Piece' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, Null Ship_to_location FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_TO_WASH_DEP ReqToWashingDetailsEO, PWC_ONT_REQ_FROM_WASH_DEP ReqFromWashingDetailsEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = ReqToWashingDetailsEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.REQ_DETAIL_ID = ReqToWashingDetailsEO.REQ_DETAIL_ID AND ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.Production_Qty IS NOT NULL AND 'Sample Status (Dispatch)' = :pSource AND HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE = :pSourceDocNo --AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId AND ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.PRODUCTION_UNIT_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO, 'PRNT'||'/'||LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'/'||FromPriDepEO.ITEM_TYPE||'/'||FromPriDepEO.FROM_PRI_DEP DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'-'||FABRIC_TYPE||'-'||FromPriDepEO.ITEM_TYPE||'-'||SIZES ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(FromPriDepEO.Receive_Qty) QUANTITY, 'Piece' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, Null Ship_to_location FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_DET_FROM_PRI_DEP FromPriDepEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND FromPriDepEO.LINE_ID = LineEO.LINE_ID AND 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' = :pSource AND HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE = :pSourceDocNo --AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId AND FromPriDepEO.PRODUCTION_UNIT_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT 'Sample Status (Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO, 'PRNT'||'/'||LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'/'||FromPriDepEO.ITEM_TYPE||'/'||FromPriDepEO.FROM_PRI_DEP DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'-'||FABRIC_TYPE||'-'||FromPriDepEO.ITEM_TYPE||'-'||SIZES ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(FromPriDepEO.Production_Qty) QUANTITY, 'Piece' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, Null Ship_to_location FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_DET_FROM_PRI_DEP FromPriDepEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND FromPriDepEO.LINE_ID = LineEO.LINE_ID AND FromPriDepEO.Production_Qty IS NOT NULL AND 'Sample Status (Dispatch)' = :pSource AND HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE = :pSourceDocNo AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO, 'EMB'||'/'||LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'/'||PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.ITEM_TYPE||'/'||PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.FROM_EMB_ID DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'-'||FABRIC_TYPE||'-'||PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.ITEM_TYPE||'-'||PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.SIZES ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.RECEIVED_QTY) QUANTITY, 'Piece' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, Null Ship_to_location FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_FROM_EMB_DEPT PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.LINE_ID = LineEO.LINE_ID AND 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' = :pSource AND HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE = :pSourceDocNo --AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId AND PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.PRODUCTION_UNIT_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT 'Sample Status (Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO, 'EMB'||'/'||LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'/'||PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.ITEM_TYPE||'/'||PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.FROM_EMB_ID DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'-'||FABRIC_TYPE||'-'||PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.ITEM_TYPE||'-'||PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.SIZES ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.PRODUCTION_QTY) QUANTITY, 'Piece' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, Null Ship_to_location FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_FROM_EMB_DEPT PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.LINE_ID = LineEO.LINE_ID AND PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.PRODUCTION_QTY IS NOT NULL AND 'Sample Status (Dispatch)' = :pSource AND HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE = :pSourceDocNo AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO, 'WSH'||'/'||LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'/'||ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.ITEM_TYPE||'/'||ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.WASH_RETURN_ID DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'-'||FABRIC_TYPE||'-'||ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.ITEM_TYPE||'-'||ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.SIZES ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.Received_Qty) QUANTITY, 'Piece' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, Null Ship_to_location FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_FROM_WASH_DEP ReqFromWashingDetailsEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.LINE_ID = LineEO.LINE_ID AND 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' = :pSource AND HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE = :pSourceDocNo --AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId AND ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.PRODUCTION_UNIT_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT 'Sample Status (Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO, 'WSH'||'/'||LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'/'||ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.ITEM_TYPE||'/'||ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.WASH_RETURN_ID DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, LineEO.SERIAL_NO||'-'||FABRIC_TYPE||'-'||ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.ITEM_TYPE||'-'||ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.SIZES ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.Production_Qty) QUANTITY, 'Piece' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, Null Ship_to_location FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_FROM_WASH_DEP ReqFromWashingDetailsEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.LINE_ID = LineEO.LINE_ID AND ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.Production_Qty IS NOT NULL AND 'Sample Status (Dispatch)' = :pSource AND HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE = :pSourceDocNo AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId --AND ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.PRODUCTION_UNIT_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT 'Sample Tracking' SOURCE, SAMPLE_ORDER_NO SOURCE_DOC_NO, SAMPLE_ORDER_NO ||'/'|| CHALLAN_NO DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, CHALLAN_NO ||'-'|| CHALLAN_LINE_ID ITEM_DETAILS, --||'-'|| MSIB.SEGMENT1 ITEM_DETAILS, Null DESCRIPTION, --MSIB.DESCRIPTION DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(CURRENT_DELIVERY) QUANTITY, 'Piece' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, Null Ship_to_location FROM XXPWC.PWC_ACCESS_SMPLE_TRCKNG_HDR PwcAccessSmpleTrckngHdrEO, PWC_ACCES_SMPLE_TRCKNG_RCD_HDR PwcAccessSmpleRcdHdrEO, PWC_ACCES_SMPLE_TRCKNG_RCD_LNS PwcAccessSmpleRcdLns --MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B MSIB WHERE PwcAccessSmpleTrckngHdrEO.HEADER_ID = PwcAccessSmpleRcdHdrEO.HEADER_ID AND PwcAccessSmpleRcdHdrEO.CHALLAN_ID = PwcAccessSmpleRcdLns.CHALLAN_ID AND CURRENT_DELIVERY IS NOT NULL AND 'Sample Tracking' = :pSource AND SAMPLE_ORDER_NO = :pSourceDocNo AND ACCESSORIES_UNIT_ID = :pOrgId
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Bundle Movement' SOURCE, PwcMfgCutissuance.CUTISSUE_NO SOURCE_DOC_NO, PwcMfgCutissuance.CUTISSUE_NO ||'/'||PwcMfgCutissuance.ISSUE_TO DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, PwcMfgCutissuance.TRACKING_NO ||' - '|| LineEO.BPO_NO ||' - '|| NVL (LineEO.ATTRIBUTE1,LNS_EMBROIDERY_ITEMCODE)|| ' - ' || LineEO.FABRIC_ITEM_CODE || ' - ' || LineEO.LNS_PIECE_NAME || ' - ' || PwcMfgCutissuance.COLOR ITEM_DETAILS , NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(ISSUED_QUANTITY) QUANTITY, 'Piece' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, Null Ship_to_location FROM PWC_MFG_CUTISSUANCE PwcMfgCutissuance, PWC_MFG_CUTISSUANCE_LINE LineEO WHERE PwcMfgCutissuance.CUTISSUE_ID = LineEO.CUTISSUE_ID AND 'Bundle Movement' = :pSource AND PwcMfgCutissuance.CUTISSUE_NO = :pSourceDocNo AND PwcMfgCutissuance.DIVISION_ID = :pOrgId AND PwcMfgCutissuance.POSTED_STATUS = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT 'Spreading Table Status (Sending)' SOURCE, HeaderEO.ATTRIBUTE1 SOURCE_DOC_NO, HeaderEO.ATTRIBUTE1 ||'/'|| LineEO.ATTRIBUTE1 DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, HeaderEO.ATTRIBUTE1 ||'/'|| LineEO.ATTRIBUTE1 ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(LineEO.ACTUAL_FABRIC_WEIGHT) QUANTITY, 'KG' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, Null Ship_to_location FROM PWC_MFG_SPREADING_T_H HeaderEO, PWC_MFG_SPREADING_T_L LineEO WHERE HeaderEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'Send for Pre-wash' AND 'Spreading Table Status (Sending)' = :pSource AND HeaderEO.ATTRIBUTE1 = :pSourceDocNo AND HeaderEO.DIVISION_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT 'Spreading Table Status (Receiving)' SOURCE, NULL SOURCE_DOC_NO, HeaderEO.ATTRIBUTE1 ||'/'|| LineEO.ATTRIBUTE1||'/'||HeaderEO.CHALLAN_NO DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, HeaderEO.ATTRIBUTE1 ||'-'|| LineEO.ATTRIBUTE1||'-'||HeaderEO.CHALLAN_NO ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(LineEO.ACTUAL_FABRIC_WEIGHT) QUANTITY, 'KG' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, null Ship_to_location FROM PWC_MFG_SPREADING_T_H HeaderEO, PWC_MFG_SPREADING_T_L LineEO WHERE HeaderEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'Receive from Pre-wash' AND 'Spreading Table Status (Receiving)' = :pSource AND HeaderEO.ATTRIBUTE1 = :pSourceDocNo AND HeaderEO.DIVISION_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT 'Dye / Wash Receive and Delivery' SOURCE, RECEIVE_NO SOURCE_DOC_NO, RECEIVE_NO ||'/'|| ISSUANCE_CHALLAN_NO DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, WASH_ORDER_NO ||'-'||STYLE||'-'||DYE_TYPE ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(QUANTITY), 'Piece' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, NULL Ship_to_location FROM pwc_mfg_dye_ir_h HeaderEO, PWC_ISSUE_REC_DYE_DEL_L PWC_ISSUE_REC_DYE_DEL_L_EO WHERE HeaderEO.IR_HEADER_ID = PWC_ISSUE_REC_DYE_DEL_L_EO.IR_HEADER_ID AND TAB_SELECTION != 'Receive' AND ISSUANCE_CHALLAN_NO IS NOT NULL AND SO_STATUS = 'Ship Confirmed' --AND AR_INVOICE_NO IS NOT NULL AND 'Dye / Wash Receive and Delivery' = :pSource AND RECEIVE_NO = :pSourceDocNo AND HeaderEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT 'Sales Order Dispatches' SOURCE, WDD.SOURCE_HEADER_NUMBER SOURCE_DOC_NO, TO_CHAR(WND.DELIVERY_ID) DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, MSIB.SEGMENT1 ITEM_DETAILS, WDD.ITEM_DESCRIPTION DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(SHIPPED_QUANTITY) QUANTITY, REQUESTED_QUANTITY_UOM UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, WDD.DELIVERY_DETAIL_ID SOURCE_ID, hl.address1 || '-' || hl.address2 || '-' || hl.address3 || '-' || hl.address4 || '-' || hl.city || '-' || hl.cOUNTRY Ship_to_location /*WDD.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID,*/ FROM WSH_DELIVERY_DETAILS WDD, WSH_DELIVERY_ASSIGNMENTS WDA, WSH_NEW_DELIVERIES WND, MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B MSIB, hz_locations hl WHERE 1 = 1 AND WDA.DELIVERY_DETAIL_ID = WDD.DELIVERY_DETAIL_ID AND MSIB.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID = WDD.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID AND MSIB.ORGANIZATION_ID = XXPWC.PWC_ORGANIZATION_NAME ('Item Master Organization') AND WND.DELIVERY_ID = WDA.DELIVERY_ID AND WDD.Ship_to_Location_id = hl.location_id AND WND.STATUS_CODE = 'CL' AND 'Sales Order Dispatches' = :pSource AND WDD.SOURCE_HEADER_NUMBER = :pSourceDocNo AND WDD.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT 'Spreading Table Status (Sending)' SOURCE, NULL SOURCE_DOC_NO, HeaderEO.ATTRIBUTE1 ||'/'|| LineEO.ATTRIBUTE1 DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, HeaderEO.ATTRIBUTE1 ||'/'|| LineEO.ATTRIBUTE1 ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(LineEO.ACTUAL_FABRIC_WEIGHT) QUANTITY, 'KG' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, null Ship_to_location FROM PWC_MFG_SPREADING_T_H HeaderEO, PWC_MFG_SPREADING_T_L LineEO WHERE HeaderEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'Send for Pre-wash' AND 'Spreading Table Status (Sending)' = :pSource AND HeaderEO.DIVISION_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT 'Spreading Table Status (Receiving)' SOURCE, NULL SOURCE_DOC_NO, HeaderEO.ATTRIBUTE1 ||'/'|| LineEO.ATTRIBUTE1||'/'||HeaderEO.CHALLAN_NO DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, HeaderEO.ATTRIBUTE1 ||'-'|| LineEO.ATTRIBUTE1||'-'||HeaderEO.CHALLAN_NO ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(LineEO.ACTUAL_FABRIC_WEIGHT) QUANTITY, 'KG' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, null Ship_to_location FROM PWC_MFG_SPREADING_T_H HeaderEO, PWC_MFG_SPREADING_T_L LineEO WHERE HeaderEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'Receive from Pre-wash' AND 'Spreading Table Status (Receiving)' = :pSource AND HeaderEO.DIVISION_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Inter Orgs' SOURCE, (MTT.TRANSFER_TRANSACTION_ID || ' - ' || TRANSFER_SUBINVENTORY || ' To ' || SUBINVENTORY_CODE || ' - ' || TRANSACTION_DATE) AS SOURCE_DOC_NO, (MTT.TRANSFER_TRANSACTION_ID || ' - ' || TRANSFER_SUBINVENTORY || ' To ' || SUBINVENTORY_CODE || ' - ' || TRANSACTION_DATE) AS DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, MSIB.SEGMENT1 ITEM_DETAILS, MSIB.DESCRIPTION, ABS(TRANSACTION_QUANTITY) QUANTITY, TRANSACTION_UOM UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, Null Ship_to_location FROM MTL_MATERIAL_TRANSACTIONS MTT, MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS MSIB WHERE MTT.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID = MSIB.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID AND 'Inter Orgs' = :pSource AND MTT.TRANSFER_TRANSACTION_ID = :pSourceDocNo AND EXISTS (SELECT OOD.ORGANIZATION_ID FROM ORG_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITIONS OOD, HR_OPERATING_UNITS HOU WHERE 1=1 AND OOD.OPERATING_UNIT = HOU.ORGANIZATION_ID AND HOU.ORGANIZATION_ID = :pOrgId AND MTT.ORGANIZATION_ID = OOD.ORGANIZATION_ID ) UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Move Order' SOURCE, MTRH.REQUEST_NUMBER AS SOURCE_DOC_NO, MTRH.REQUEST_NUMBER AS DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, MSIB.SEGMENT1 ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TRANSACTION_QUANTITY QUANTITY, TRANSACTION_UOM UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, Null Ship_to_location FROM MTL_MATERIAL_TRANSACTIONS MTT, MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS MSIB, MTL_TXN_REQUEST_HEADERS MTRH WHERE MTT.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID = MSIB.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID AND MTT.TRANSACTION_SOURCE_ID = MTRH.HEADER_ID AND 'Move Order' = :pSource AND MTRH.REQUEST_NUMBER = :pSourceDocNo AND SIGN(TRANSACTION_QUANTITY) = 1 AND EXISTS (SELECT OOD.ORGANIZATION_ID FROM ORG_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITIONS OOD, HR_OPERATING_UNITS HOU WHERE 1=1 AND OOD.OPERATING_UNIT = HOU.ORGANIZATION_ID AND HOU.ORGANIZATION_ID = :pOrgId AND MTRH.ORGANIZATION_ID = OOD.ORGANIZATION_ID ) UNION ALL SELECT 'Issue / Receive Garments - Issue' SOURCE, HeaderEO.RECEIVE_NO SOURCE_DOC_NO, HeaderEO.RECEIVE_NO DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, LineEO.ATTRIBUTE2||'-'||PIECE_NAME ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(LineEO.QUANTITY) QUANTITY, 'Piece' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, Null Ship_to_location
FROM PWC_MFG_ISSUE_REC_WASH_H HeaderEO, PWC_MFG_ISSUE_REC_WASH_L_H LineHeaderEO, PWC_MFG_ISSUE_REC_WASH_L LineEO WHERE HeaderEO.HEADER_ID = LineHeaderEO.HEADER_ID AND LineHeaderEO.LINE_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND 'Issue / Receive Garments - Issue' = :pSource AND HeaderEO.RECEIVE_NO = :pSourceDocNo AND HeaderEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT 'Issue / Receive Garments - Receive' SOURCE, HeaderEO.RECEIVE_NO SOURCE_DOC_NO, HeaderEO.RECEIVE_NO DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, LineEO.ATTRIBUTE2 ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER(LineEO.ATTRIBUTE4) QUANTITY, 'Piece' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, Null Ship_to_location FROM PWC_MFG_ISSUE_REC_WASH_H HeaderEO, PWC_MFG_ISSUE_REC_WASH_L_H LineHeaderEO, PWC_MFG_ISSUE_REC_WASH_D LineEO WHERE HeaderEO.HEADER_ID = LineHeaderEO.HEADER_ID AND LineEO.HEADER_ID = LineHeaderEO.LINE_ID AND 'Issue / Receive Garments - Receive' = :pSource AND HeaderEO.RECEIVE_NO = :pSourceDocNo AND HeaderEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT 'Accessories Movement' SOURCE, HederEO.DOCUMENT_NO SOURCE_DOC_NO, HederEO.UNIT_NAME || ' : ' || HederEO.DOCUMENT_NO DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, (LineEO.GREIGE_ITEM) ITEM_DETAILS, LineEO.GREIGE_ITEM_DESC DESCRIPTION, TO_NUMBER (GREIGE_QUANTITY) QUANTITY, LineEO.GREIGE_UOM UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, 0 SOURCE_ID, NULL Ship_to_location FROM PWC_ACCESSORIES_MOVEMENT_HDR HederEO, PWC_ACCESSORIES_MOVEMENT_LNS LineEO WHERE 1 = 1 AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND 'Accessories Movement' = :pSource AND HederEO.DOCUMENT_NO = :pSourceDocNo And HEDEREO.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'Send to Dyeing' AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId
UNION ALL
/* Formatted on 12/22/2024 4:52:50 PM (QP5 v5.256.13226.35510) */ SELECT 'Send for Pre-Wash' SOURCE, -- RPH.DIVISION_ID, -- RPL.CUTTING_UNIT, -- rpl.ratio_plan_no, RPP.CUT_NO SOURCE_DOC_NO, RPPW.SENDING_CHALLAN_NO DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, RPH.TRACKING_NO || '::' || (select bpo_no from PWC_MFG_RATIOPLAN_STNS_ALL RPSA where rpsa.ratio_plan_line_id = rpl.ratio_plan_line_id and rownum=1) || '::' || RPPW.CUT_NUMBER || '::' || RFD.ITEM_CODE || '::' || RFD.PIECE_NAME || '::' || RFD.COLOR_PACK ITEM_DETAILS,
'' DESCRIPTION,
RPPW.QTY QUANTITY, 'KG' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, RPPW.PRE_WASH_ID SOURCE_ID, '' SHIP_TO_LOCATION FROM PWC_MFG_RATIOPLAN RPH, PWC_MFG_MARKER_LINES RPL, PWC_MFG_RATIOPLAN_PLYCFLINE RPP, PWC_MFG_RATIO_PLAN_PRE_WASH RPPW, PWC_MFG_RATIOPLAN_FABRIC_DET RFD WHERE 1 = 1 AND RPH.RATIOPLAN_ID = RPL.RATIO_PLAN_ID AND RPL.RATIO_PLAN_LINE_ID = RPP.RATIO_PLAN_LINE_ID AND RPP.PLYCFLINE_ID = RPPW.PLY_CF_LINE_ID AND RPPW.PRE_WSH_FABRIC_CODE = RFD.FAB_UNIQUE_CODE -- AND rph.ratioplan_Number = '2024/668' AND RPPW.STATUS = 'Send for Pre-Wash' AND 'Send for Pre-Wash' = :pSource AND RPP.CUT_NO = :pSourceDocNo AND RPH.DIVISION_ID = :pOrgId
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Receive from Pre-Wash' SOURCE, -- RPH.DIVISION_ID, -- RPL.CUTTING_UNIT,
RPP.CUT_NO SOURCE_DOC_NO, RPPW.SENDING_CHALLAN_NO DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO,
RPH.TRACKING_NO || '::' || (select bpo_no from PWC_MFG_RATIOPLAN_STNS_ALL RPSA where rpsa.ratio_plan_line_id = rpl.ratio_plan_line_id and rownum=1) || '::' || RPPW.CUT_NUMBER || '::' || RFD.ITEM_CODE || '::' || RFD.PIECE_NAME || '::' || RFD.COLOR_PACK ITEM_DETAILS,
'' DESCRIPTION,
RPPW.QTY QUANTITY, 'KG' UOM, null SECONDARY_QTY, null SECONDARY_UOM, RPPW.PRE_WASH_ID SOURCE_ID, '' SHIP_TO_LOCATION FROM PWC_MFG_RATIOPLAN RPH, PWC_MFG_MARKER_LINES RPL, PWC_MFG_RATIOPLAN_PLYCFLINE RPP, PWC_MFG_RATIO_PLAN_PRE_WASH RPPW, PWC_MFG_RATIOPLAN_FABRIC_DET RFD WHERE 1 = 1 AND RPH.RATIOPLAN_ID = RPL.RATIO_PLAN_ID AND RPL.RATIO_PLAN_LINE_ID = RPP.RATIO_PLAN_LINE_ID AND RPP.PLYCFLINE_ID = RPPW.PLY_CF_LINE_ID AND RPPW.PRE_WSH_FABRIC_CODE = RFD.FAB_UNIQUE_CODE -- AND rph.ratioplan_Number = '2024/668' AND RPPW.STATUS = 'Receive from Pre-Wash' AND 'Receive from Pre-Wash' = :pSource AND RPP.CUT_NO = :pSourceDocNo AND RPH.DIVISION_ID = :pOrgId
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Export Packing List' SOURCE, to_char ( h.SHPCKASSORT_NO ) SOURCE_DOC_NO, fabric_req_no || ' - '|| DCPO || ' - PL'||shpckassort_no DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO, mv.style_name ITEM_DETAILS, NULL DESCRIPTION, -- h.TOTAL_QTY QUANTITY,
(SELECT SUM ( h.TOTAL_QTY * S2.NO_OF_PIECE) FROM PWC_MFG_BSS_STYLE_L S2, PWC_MFG_BSS_SEASON_D S1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND H.TRACKING_NO = S1.TRACKING_NO AND S1.LINE_ID = S2.LINE_ID) QUANTITY, 'pcs' UOM,
TOTAL_CARTON_QTY SECONDARY_QTY, 'Carton' SECONDARY_UOM, SHPCKASSORT_ID SOURCE_ID, NULL SHIP_TO_LOCATION
FROM CUST_PWC_ONT_FINISHPCKASSORT H, PWC_OM_FABRIC_REQ_SHEET_HDR FRSH, APPSRO.XXDBL_RMG_MASTER_TRACKING_V MV WHERE H.TRACKING_NO = FRSH.TRACKING_NUMBER AND H.TRACKING_NO =MV.TRACKING_NO AND 'Export Packing List' = :pSource AND H.shpckassort_no = :pSourceDocNo AND H.DIVISION_ID = :pOrgId
)ABC WHERE 1=1 AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM XXPWC.PWC_GATE_PASS_LINES GPL, XXPWC.PWC_GATE_PASS_DETAILS GPD WHERE 1=1 AND GPL.LINE_ID = GPD.LINE_ID AND GPL.DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO = ABC.DELIVERY_CHALLAN_NO AND GPL.SOURCE_DOC_NO = ABC.SOURCE_DOC_NO AND GPD.ITEM_DETAILS = ABC.ITEM_DETAILS AND GPD.SOURCE_ID = ABC.SOURCE_ID )
